entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 21. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind east 20 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Blowing snow at times. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 18. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Friday 24 March 2023
